string-array.name: questions
string-array.item: How willing are you to check your blood glucose 4 times per day?
What is your interest in taking your Bolus at breakfast?
What is your interest in taking your Bolus at lunch?
What is your interest in taking your Bolus at dinner?
What is your interest in taking your Bolus with snacks?
How willing are you to checking your Bolus BEFORE meals rather than after?
What is your interest in changing the pump infusion site every 2-3 days (rather than 4-5)?
How willing are you to carefully count your Carbs today?
How do you feel about purposefully exercising at least 5 times per week?
How do you feel about doing extra physical activity throughout your day (EX: Taking stairs not elevator, or walking your pet)?
How do you feel about eating 5 or more servings of fruits and vegetables daily?
How do you feel about drinking at least 8 glasses of water daily?

resources.string: Redirecting you to the Market to download the Frozen Bubble Level Editor...
Cannot find Android Market! Please install Frozen Bubble Level Editor manually.

TiltMazes - A logical puzzle game
 Copyright © 2009, Balázs Lécz
 
 A ball sits in a flat tray containing one or more squares (goals). The challenge is to guide the ball around the tray and collect all the squares. Tilt the phone to start the ball rolling.
 The ball rolls in a straight line until it hits a wall, you can then tilt again.
 
 Based on the 2D tilt-maze collection at http://www.clickmazes.com
 Maze designs used with permission.
 Maze concepts and designs © Andrea Gilbert <andrea@clickmazes.com>.
 See the source code at http://code.google.com/p/tiltmazes
